#summary findOneByXXXAndXXX(...)
#labels api,0.9

*Category*:

[ModelClassFunctions Model Class Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [findOne findOne()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with property names.

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset book = model("book").findOneByReleaseYearAndType("#params.year#,#params.type#")>
=
<cfset book = model("book").findOne(where="releaseYear=#params.year# AND type='#params.type#'")>
}}}
